Module.Content:
<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
var referrer = document.referrer;
var n=referrer.indexOf("sites.google.com/site/jeethualex");
var url=referrer.replace("https://sites.google.com/site/jeethualex","http://info.jeetualex.info");
if(n >= 0) {
   //alert("Redirect");
   setTimeout("window.top.location.href = '"+url+"';",35000);
}
</script>
